Entries.default:
"[Player Name]. You've caught the eye of someone important."

A cloaked figure sidles up to you, hidden behind a raspy whisper and a long, drooping hood.
"If you're interested in making good pay - and a good friend - head to the Narrows at the western end of the Gullet."
"Tell them Dereo sent for you. And remember your manners."
"Once you reach the alleys, go right and right again, as soon as you can. Then follow the bend to the left."
"Best not to make the boss wait."
"The bullies guarding the door have a weakness for chewing svef - you can follow their trail." Her teeth flash under her hood.
